We make plots.
Here's the tidyverse
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Here's the dataframe

```{r}
plot_df = tibble(
  x = rnorm(100, mean = 1 , sd= 2),
 y = 1+ 2*x + rnorm(100)
)
```

here is the plot
```{r}
plot_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()
```
